scripts.gen:clients: npx prisma generate --schema=inventory-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=procurement-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=auth-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=plt-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=dtrs-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=alms-svc/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e tests/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=inventory-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e tests/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=procurement-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e tests/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=auth-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e tests/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=plt-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e tests/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=dtrs-svc/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e tests/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=alms-svc/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.wait:ci: wait-on -t 60000 http://localhost:4001/health http://localhost:4002/health http://localhost:4000/health http://localhost:4005/health http://localhost:4006/health http://localhost:4007/health http://localhost:8080/health
scripts.start:ci: concurrently -k -s first -n inv,proc,auth,plt,dtrs,alms,gw,jobs -c green,magenta,cyan,yellow,blue,red,white,gray "node inventory-svc/src/server.js" "node procurement-svc/src/server.js" "node auth-svc/src/server.js" "node plt-svc/src/server.js" "node dtrs-svc/src/server.js" "node alms-svc/src/server.js" "node gateway/src/index.js" "node jobs/index.js"
